data.name: Fallen Tear : The Ascension
data.detailed_description:
Sign up for our Newsletter!


Join our Discord!


About the Game

Discover the darkness that lies within. Forge the future and ascend to power!


Embark on a journey with the mysterious youth "Hira" as he goes on a quest to unlock the secrets of a dangerous fantasy world to save a loved one. Navigate treacherous terrain, fight powerful monsters, and grow with experience to prepare for the challenges that lay ahead.


Explore the world of Raoah


Raoah is filled with many different and unique locales: from towns bustling with daily commerce, to the crumbling ruins of temples for ancient, forgotten gods. Each of these different locations offer new challenges and secrets for the player to uncover and overcome.


Awaken your Ascensions


As Hira grows in power, he gains abilities called Ascensions which allow him to traverse the environment and overcome his enemies. These range from powerful strikes that break walls to dashes that can be done both on ground and air. Find them and the world will open up to you!


Find the 22 Fated Bonds


Find and recruit 22 different "Fated Bonds", unique characters chosen by ancient pacts, whose Talents will assist in the accomplishment of his mission. The Trust forged and collected from these connections will unravel powers hidden within Hira's enigmatic origins.


Unite to Win


The combined powers of the Fated Bonds manifest as powerful abilities. Certain Bonds have a synergy with each other that can be called upon when they are in the same party. Use these Unity Attacks to turn the tide of battle!

data.short_description: Fallen Tear : The Ascension is a hand-crafted 2D open-world Metroidvania set in the mystic world of Raoah. In this Epic Fantasy, you take the role of a mysterious child named Hira, who seeks the 22 Fated Bonds to learn the truth of his origins and save a loved one.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G2020 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650 or Radeon HD 7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3220 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 Ti or AMD R7 260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
